Title: Me and You
Writer: Niccolò Ammaniti (based on the novel by), Niccolò Ammaniti (screenplay), Umberto Contarello (screenplay), Francesca Marciano (screenplay), Bernardo Bertolucci (screenplay)
Actors: Jacopo Olmo Antinori, Tea Falco, Sonia Bergamasco, Veronica Lazar
Plot: A 14-year-old pretends to go on a ski trip, but actually spends the week in isolation in his basement, escaping society's pressure. When his 25-year-old half-sister enters the basement, a few emotional and confronting days and nights ensue.
